# URICA (University of Rhode Island Change Assessment)

## Access

Use the official URICA form and scoring guidance from the UMBC HABITS Lab.
This repository does not reproduce the URICA items to avoid version mismatch.

Official resource:

```text
https://habitslab.umbc.edu/ttm-measures/
```

## Version Notes (Summary)

- Multiple versions exist (e.g., 32‑item, 28‑item, 24‑item forms depending on target behavior).
- Use the version appropriate to your population and target behavior.

## Documentation Template

- Version used:
- Precontemplation score:
- Contemplation score:
- Action score:
- Maintenance score:
- Dominant stage:
- Intervention focus:
